attributes.action:
Strip Bernard Ingram of his knighthood over lies he perpetuated on
Hillsborough
attributes.additional_details: Even in light of the second Inquest 'sir' Bernard still refuses to accept the fact that he was wrong and has allowed the distress he has caused to the survivors and families to continue for 27 years.
attributes.background: The advice given by Bernard Ingram to the then Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher was instrumental in this countries and worldwide perception of events on that day and directly contributed to the distress of the survivors and their families.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
